title.narrative: SSC India DK, Wind Power - Phase I
Improved framework conditions for sustainable development

description.narrative:
SSC contributions in 2019 to framework conditions within energy in India: "5 ".
Score from 1-5, 1 lowest and 5 highest.
The planned output targets in the project have been met in 2019.
Several activities were arranged in 2019; - Full implementation of SSC activities incl. successful 1st meeting in the Steering Committee. - Signing of SSC Cooperation agreement with MNRE - 17 Indian officials received DFC scholarships to participate in the four energy courses in Denmark - 1 research project given under Window 2 to DTU Wind: ” Maintenance and Repair Strategy for Wind Energy Development” (3 years, DKK 4,7 million) - 3 mobility grants given to Indian researchers for conducting research with Danish research institutions (Power system architecture for microgrids, Recycling of lithium-ion batteries for energy storage, Hybrid energy storage for smart community microgrid incl. EV charging) - 7 DEA visits to India and 4 delegations to Denmark.
